mahindage me debidi deshapalana gema pasugiyada rangadakwunu 19 wani wyawastha sanshodhanayedi da sajiwiwa wikashaya wiya. 19 wani sanshodhanaya magin rate palanaya demala, muslim jathiwadin athata pathwana bawa madagoda abhayathissa, bengamuwe nalaka, ellawala medhananda, muruththettuwe aananda, galagodaaththe gnyanasara paà·Šramukha himiwaruda, gunadasa amarasekara, nalin da silwa, manohara da silwa yana ayada sinhalayin biyapath karamin pawasuha.
